title: Merge two notes into a single note

When identical keep a single field.description: if two merged cards have the same value in both field, don't concatenate those values.

Delete original cards.description: if True, the original cards are deleted.

Overwrite patterns.description: RegExp patterns that indicate a field will be replaced by the value from the other note. Be sure to escape special characters if you want to match them literally. For instance, if you want fields with the text "[REPLACEME]" to be overwritten, the configuration value would have to look like this: ["\\[REPLACEME\\]"]

Strong tags.description: Strong tags: Notes with any of these tags will have their non-empty fields overwrite any fields in the other note. "Overwrite patterns" takes precedence.

Weak tags.description: Notes with any of these tags will have all their fields be overwritten by non-empty fields in the other note. "Overwrite patterns" and "Strong tags" take precedence.
